synopsis.p: Convert a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image to an extended Portable PixMap (PPMX) image.

description.p: Convert a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image to an extended Portable PixMap (PPMX) image.
The PPMX image file is written to standard output.
Extended Portable PixMap files are an enhanced form of PPM files that include an extra alpha channel mask.

example.description: Convert PNG file inp.png to the PPMX file out.ppmx.
